title: Becoming Lady Thomas
description: ***This is book one in the series but can be read as a standalone. It is novella length.***  Elisabeth Merriweather has one destiny.  His name is William.  The moment William returns from university, he has promised to marry his childhood sweetheart, Elisabeth. Unfortunately, as he prepares to propose, they learn that her father has done the unthinkable. In an effort to save their farm, he has incurred an exuberant amount of gambling debts that he cannot ever repay and become involved with a man of incredible wealth and power.  His name is Lord Thomas.  When the debtor decides to pardon the debt in exchange for one simple favor, Elisabeth’s father wholeheartedly agrees. Lord Thomas, upon seeing the portrait of the three beautiful daughters, negotiates to marry the daughter of his choosing.  He chooses Elisabeth.  What happens when Elisabeth’s entire life plan is overturned by one simple deal with the devil and she’s whisked away to London as his prize?  Will her traitorous heart fall for Lord Thomas, or will it stay true to William?
author: K. Webster
